attributes.review: This app took 43 hours to download and used up all my storage even though I supposedly had plenty! Upon opening the app, I was immediately forced to give all possible contact information and when I gave it, I was SPAMMED with messages that crashed every piece of technology that I own! After this catastrophe the entire executive branch of government raided my house, stole all of my possessions, murdered my pets and family and imprisoned me for life! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: ✨🖕🏼Cheeto🖕🏼✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app this morning, but I forgot about it until I heard my phone talking and it was saying things like “She👩🏽 like🌂Papî 🍰I 🍾adore 💘you🤸‍♀️I'm 🛍like 🩸Baby 🎀 I 🖍ain't 💅normal👩‍🦯 Rrrrr 🦁 🦁🦁 foreigner 💞 foreigner 💞 foreigner💕” and “ˢʰᵃʷᵗʸˢˡⁱᵏᵉᵃᵐᵉˡᵒᵈʸⁱⁿᵐʸʰᵉᵃᵈᵗʰᵃⁱᶜᵃⁿᵗᵏᵉᵉᵖᵒᵘᵗᵍᵒᵗᵐᵉˢⁱⁿᵍⁱⁿˡⁱᵏᵉⁿᵃⁿᵃⁿᵃⁿᵃᵉᵛᵉʳʸᵈᵃ.” I got scared so I tried to delete the app but It wouldn’t let me until I sang with it 😭😭.  I was able to delete it after a couple of songs, so beware before downloading it because I’m traumatized.

attributes.title: WORST IDEA EVER
attributes.review: I tried to download it to see what I can do to support my racist, homophobic, transphobic, unintelligent, ignorant president but it took more then 4 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD. When I opened up the app, it completely fried my PHONE and I HAD TO GET A NEW ONE. Worst app ever and I wouldn’t recommend it to ANYONE. So disappointed with the presidents ability’s to work technology. The app was so unorganized, I thought my 2 year old brother put it together. Absolutely terrible. It’s so bad that I am astronomically DISSATISFIED.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app to support our ✨O R A N G E ✨president and was absolutely disappointed the app quality was terrible, it took HOURSSS to download (and it wasnt even worth it), it drained my battery and the app was just overall absolute trash 🗑 then again what else could you expect🤷🏻‍♀️this is the WORST app i have ever downloaded and i also find it to even be a disgrace that the oompa loompa has such a terrible app, you tried hun🧚🏻‍♂️✨💕❤️👑now never try again✨🥺🧚🏻‍♂️👑❤️💕.                                                       Yours truly,

attributes.title: Terrible app 🤢
attributes.review: I expected this to just be a fun app to gain information on my president, but I ended up having my personal information taken away! Even though it’s an app that was made in America and isn’t even usuable in China, they’re still able to get ahold of my location and information that I’ve never even given to the app!! I very much recommend getting as far away from this app as possible.

attributes.title: BEWARE OF APP !
attributes.review: Wow I could not have had a WORSE experience with this application! First it seemed ok but I have been getting non stop calls about CHINA. CHINÃ. I don’t know what propaganda is being spread through the use of this app but this is NOT ok ! Not only a couple hours later my phone starts glitching out while I was trying to buy tickets for the upcoming rally. Before I knew it my phone was engulfed by flames. FIRE I TELL YOU!!! I bet those PESKY liberals are behind this somehow !

attributes.title: UH OH STINKY
attributes.review: I was girl in the village doing all right then I became a princes overnight and I trying to figure out how to do it right so much to learn and see up in the castle with my new family in a school that’s just for royalty a whole enchanted world is waiting for me I’m so excited to be Sofia the first I’m finding out what being royal is all about Sofia the first making my way to new adventures every day Sofia it’s gonna be my time to show them all that I’m Sofia the first

attributes.title: Joke of an app ✨
attributes.review: First off, the user interface is terrible. I could barely get around the app without coming across ignorance and sexism. I could build a better app from the block coding I learned in middle school. The utter disgrace this app is to our country is appalling. I can’t believe other countries can see this and recognize it as American. This is a joke of a country because of this app (and trump). If I could give it 0 starts I would.

attributes.title: This app is terrible it doesn’t even deserve a one star
attributes.review: This app hacked my phone and deleted my photos now I can’t open my other phone I had to buy a new phone just so I can write a review this app does not even deserve a star I am mad and furious I had so many pics and now there all gone my app data got deleted to and I can’t open my phone so if you want to destroy this is not the way please do not download this app
